title: Restore “Explore Our Work” Sample 1–12 galleries for Business Card, Logo Design, Product Banner, and Photo Frame with admin-only uploads

requirements.text: Add backend support for storing and serving 12 sample images (Sample 1–12) for each “Explore Our Work” category: Business Card, Logo Design, Product Banner, and Photo Frame. Provide public read APIs to fetch samples per category, and admin-only write APIs to upload/replace/remove samples by slot position (1–12).

Admin only mai mere pass access rahe iska

acceptanceCriteria: Backend can return a stable, ordered list/record of 12 sample slots per category (positions 1–12), where each slot may be empty or contain an uploaded image blob + description.
Non-admin callers cannot modify any sample slots; attempts trap/return an authorization error.
Admin callers can upload/replace any subset of slots (e.g., only Sample 7) without affecting the other slots.
Public (non-admin) callers can fetch samples for all categories without needing authentication (read-only).

requirements.text: Update the frontend product pages for Business Card, Brand Logo Design, Product Banner Design, and Photo Frame Design to display an “Explore Our Work” samples gallery showing 12 slots (Sample 1–12) for that product category. Empty slots must still render as visible placeholders so the gallery never looks “missing”.

acceptanceCriteria: Each of the four product pages shows a samples section with exactly 12 labeled slots (Sample 1 through Sample 12).
If a slot has an uploaded image, it is displayed; if not, the slot displays a consistent placeholder (English text) indicating no image uploaded yet.
The samples gallery is visible to all visitors (customers can view but not edit).
All user-facing text added for this feature is in English.

requirements.text: Add an admin-only frontend interface to upload/replace Explore Our Work sample images for each category (Business Card, Logo Design, Product Banner, Photo Frame), for all 12 slots. Ensure this admin UI is not accessible to non-admin users (hide UI and block actions).

quotes: Admin only mai mere pass access rahe iska

acceptanceCriteria: When the logged-in caller is not an admin, the upload controls are not rendered and sample update actions cannot be triggered from the UI.
When the caller is an admin, the UI allows selecting files and uploading updates for any subset of Sample 1–12 for each category.
Uploads accept JPG/PNG and show clear English validation errors for invalid file types.
After a successful upload, the affected product page galleries show the new images without requiring a hard refresh (React Query invalidation/refetch).

requirements.text: Ensure the Home page “Our Premium Services” section remains unchanged (no content edits and no samples added there) while implementing the Explore Our Work sample restoration.

quotes: Main point aap home page ➡️ our premium service ➡️ buisness card design, brand logo design, photo frame design, product banner design inme change nhi karna hai kuch na hi inme sample add karna hai
Our premium service me kuch bhi change ment nhi karna hai

acceptanceCriteria: No new sample UI is added inside the Home page “Our Premium Services” section.
The existing “Our Premium Services” cards, text, and layout remain functionally identical after the change.

requirements.text: If backend state schema changes are required to expand existing Product Banner samples (currently 4 slots) to 12 slots and to add other categories, add a conditional Motoko migration that preserves any already-stored Product Banner sample images (e.g., existing Sample 1–4 data) during upgrade.
acceptanceCriteria: On upgrade, previously uploaded Product Banner sample slots that existed before the change remain available in their corresponding positions after deployment.
No existing sample blob data is lost due to the upgrade.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text added/changed as part of this request.
Do not modify or add sample content inside Home → “Our Premium Services”.
Admin-only means only the admin principal(s) recognized by the existing backend authorization system can upload/update samples; customers must not be able to edit.
nonGoals: Do not add sample galleries to the Home page “Our Premium Services” section.
Do not implement third-party authentication; continue using the existing Internet Identity + backend admin verification.
Do not build customer-facing sample upload/edit functionality.
